Tigerhawk shakes his head "Ok since I've seen how this works I can't talk you 
out so I might as well help. Puts a CD in the computer record this fight I 
need to gather all the data on the other fighter."  Tigerhawk Spins around in 
the command chair "Heres the plan in 2 steps. "Tigerhawk Pulls up layout of 
Zardus ship. "odds are that the alliances holding cell are here a red light 
goes off in the center of the ship." 

"Step.1 Autoguns and shields.  
"Me and the Radicons can generate a high enough energy level to Draw off the 
autoguns. While Archangel will break through the shields"

Tigerhawk Tosses a weird shaped grenade to Archangel "this Pure Water a 
device which a hole in the shield pure water is water with the electrolytes 
removed so it cannot carry electricity and a shield energy is mostly 
electricity so it will give you some time to get in."

Step.2  Split into teams and search the ship. 
Get Iron and hall ass back here and get ready to defend against a counter 
attack. Hands all the people going a holocube 

"This our chance to get the preds and alliance fighting each cube will make 
us look like a pred of your choice. Tigerhawk turns on his cube and looks 
like hellbeast.

Computer "pred  alert pred alert autoguns online."

Tigerhawk cut off the cube "It will mask out energy signals. Any questions ?"
